info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 12:35PM EDT until April 5 at 1:36AM EDT by NWS Jackson KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...
Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County.
Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna.
* WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road are flooded in several places.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:20 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue to a crest of 23.4 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening, before rising once again Saturday night into Sunday. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING
